error.pageNotFoundDescription: Oops! It looks like this page no longer exists or never did. The link might be outdated, or you may have taken a wrong turn. But don’t worry, there’s plenty to explore on my website! Head back to the homepage and find what you need.

contactUs.title: Professional Development and Optimization – Full Stack Solutions for Your Business
contactUs.description: Do you want to turn your idea into a powerful and efficient IT product? I am a Full Stack developer who will create **fast, secure, and scalable web applications** for you. I develop **REST API, GraphQL, microservices, web applications** and integrate them into flexible ecosystems. **Load speed optimization, user-friendly interfaces, and modern tech stack** – these are what will make your project stand out. **Trust an expert** – contact me, and I will help take your product to the next level.

contact.title: Contact Me
contact.description: I am always open to new projects, ideas, and collaboration opportunities. If you have an interesting project or a task that needs solving, feel free to reach out! I will be happy to help bring your ideas to life.

form.errorMessage: Error sending message. Please try again later
form.sendingError: An error occurred while sending the message

validation.nameMinLength: Name must be at least 2 characters long
validation.nameRegex: Name can only contain letters and spaces
validation.invalidEmail: Please enter a valid email address
validation.messageMinLength: Message must be at least 100 characters long
